Text: Strange... We've rehearsed so much, and yet...

Yes, the results are, how should I put it...far from
satisfactory.
What does our producer think? Please be honest.
Hmm, well...

(They aren't in sync at all! To the point it's almost
impressive! Can two people be any more out of step
with each other?)

First off, your field of view is kinda limited, Rose.
It's like you can't see Alexia there dancing with
you.
Ulp, you have a point...

And as for you, Alexia, you're being too formulaic.
I'm talking so rigid that it shows.
B-But, that shouldn't be...true...

(Judging by those reactions, they both know what
they're doing wrong...)

(I guess the issue is that they don't know how to fix
it. And these aren't the kind of things that I can
make click for them just by using the right combo of
words.)

(Having said that, it wouldn't be great to send them
out there as-is... Hmm, I gotta do something—)
(...Huh? Th-This magic...?!)

So, do we simply need to rehearse more and improve...
Um, Cid?
Sh-She's coming... I gotta hide!
Coming? Who do you—
Oh, Ciiiid!!!
Is that...Claire I hear? She sounds very angry.
My life as a producer may be over...!
Wh-What?! You can't be serious, not after all this!

Then we have no choice but to act in unison to
conceal your presence.
Th-Thanks! I'll escape through the window!

Ohhh, Ciiiid... Just how many promises do you intend
to break...?

...Oh, Princess Rose, Princess Alexia. Why are you
dressed like that?

We have our reasons... I would also appreciate it if
you did not attempt to pry any further.
Hmm... Well, okay. My lips are sealed.

Now, about Cid! I know I saw him enter this room, so
where is he?
Beats me. Maybe you mistook him for someone else?

Don't be ridiculous! I of all people would never
mistake Cid for anyone else!

Maybe...you've pulled some cruel trick on him again!
And now you're trying to keep me from finding out—

Stop right there. As I stated before, there is a good
reason we are dressed as we are.

That is also why we are doing our preparations in
absolute secrecy...with the assistance of someone.
What? How does that matter?

Well, since we are working in secret, we chose
someone inconspicuous to be our assistant. Isn't that
right, Alexia?

...Yes. He's the plainest of students with black
hair and no defining features to make him stand out
whatsoever.
And you're suggesting I mistook him for Cid?
Yeah, though I know it must be hard to admit..
Uh-huh...

O-Of course, Cid makes up for his nondescript
appearance with his pure heart! Alexia, don't you
agree?!

Huh? W-Well, I don't know if it's his heart or his
love for gold that's pure, but, sure...
...Do you honestly think that?
Y-Yes...

...Well, I suppose you would know after toying with
him like you have. Fine, I'll take you at your word
for today.
We appreciate it.

But! If you lead him on again...you know what will
happen, yes?
Yes, we understand.
Hmph, good. See you later.
...Whew. Looks like we weathered the storm.

Although I did feel a little chill run through me
when you turned her attention my way. But maybe us
being able to ad-lib our stories to match saved the
day.
Heehee, I know you would be able to handle it.
Nice! Just don't forget that feeling, okay?
Ack! Don't jump out like that! You scared me!
What do you mean by "that feeling"?

What I mean is it might be good if you act in sync
like you did just now when you sing and dance, too.

Moving however you want and having faith in your
partner so you can loosen up are different things.

I see... It does make sense when you explain it that
way. Thank you for the wonderful advice!

You almost sounded like a real producer for a second.
But, maybe you're onto something.

(Hopefully we're okay in the song and dance
department now. But I feel like this still isn't
quite enough.)

(We need one last bit of spice to really make
them shine as idols. In other words—)
